1.description: The chosen one, dealing with the aftermath of his campaign against the Seanchan and preparing for even greater challenges.

12.description: Enters into a unique bond with three women, creating an unprecedented connection in the One Power.

25.description: Plans a dangerous mission to Far Madding, where channeling is impossible and enemies wait.

1.description: Consumed with finding and rescuing Faile from her Shaido captors, willing to make any alliance necessary.

5.description: Makes difficult alliances and prepares for the assault on the Shaido camp to rescue the captives.

9.description: Finds himself in occupied Ebou Dar under Seanchan control, navigating the complex political situation.

17.description: Becomes involved with a mysterious Seanchan woman of high rank, creating complications.

25.description: Continues to lead the rebel Aes Sedai siege of Tar Valon, working to reunite the White Tower.

30.description: Faces new challenges in maintaining unity among the rebels as the siege continues.

9.description: Works to secure her claim to the Lion Throne of Andor while dealing with complex political maneuvering.

12.description: Enters into the unique three-way bond with Rand, creating an unprecedented connection.

9.description: Continues her training as a Wise One while supporting Elayne in Caemlyn and dealing with her feelings for Rand.

12.description: Participates in the unprecedented bonding ceremony that links her with Rand and the others.

1.description: Remains close to Rand, using her viewing ability to help guide his decisions during dangerous times.

12.description: Becomes part of the unique three-way bond with Rand, sharing the connection with Elayne and Aviendha.

1.description: The legendary Aes Sedai continues to advise and challenge Rand, pushing him toward necessary actions.

34.description: Plays a crucial role in supporting a major working of the One Power to accomplish something unprecedented.

1.description: Remains at Rand's side as advisor and protector, though no longer bonded as a Warder.

25.description: Accompanies Rand on the dangerous mission to Far Madding where they cannot channel.
Works with the rebel Aes Sedai while maintaining her fierce independence and devotion to her friends.

34.description: Participates in an enormous working of the One Power, contributing her exceptional strength and skill.

1.description: A former Seanchan damane of tremendous strength in the One Power, now free and learning to use her abilities.

34.description: Uses her exceptional power and unique knowledge to contribute to a major working of the One Power.

25.description: Brown Ajah Aes Sedai working with the rebels, pursuing her scholarly interests while supporting the cause.

34.description: Contributes her knowledge and power to a massive working, drawing on her extensive research and experience.

25.description: Brown Ajah Aes Sedai among the rebels, dedicated to the scholarly pursuits of her Ajah.

34.description: Participates in the massive circle for an unprecedented working of the One Power.

25.description: Sea Folk Windfinder continuing to fulfill her people's obligations while pursuing her own goals.

34.description: Contributes her unique Sea Folk knowledge and power to an enormous working of saidar.

25.description: An Aes Sedai working with the rebel forces in their siege of the White Tower.

34.description: Takes part in the massive circle working, contributing her strength to the unprecedented effort.

1.description: Former false Dragon, now one of the most powerful and trusted Asha'man serving under Rand.

34.description: Leads a group of Asha'man in support of a massive working, providing male channeling strength.

1.description: Elderly Asha'man with exceptional Healing abilities, one of Rand's most trusted followers.

34.description: Contributes his healing knowledge and power to a major working of saidin.

1.description: Young Asha'man from Arafel, increasingly skilled and trusted by Rand for important missions.

34.description: Participates in the massive working, contributing his strength and skill with saidin.

1.description: Young Asha'man dedicated to serving Rand and learning to use his abilities responsibly.

34.description: Takes part in the unprecedented working, showing his growth and dedication to the cause.

25.description: An Asha'man serving with the forces supporting the major working.

34.description: Contributes his power to the massive working of saidin.

25.description: Asha'man participating in the support efforts for a major undertaking.

34.description: Takes part in the massive circle working with saidin.

25.description: Asha'man working to support the major effort being undertaken.

34.description: Participates in the unprecedented working with saidin, contributing his strength.

1.description: Held captive by the Shaido Aiel, working to survive and protect the other prisoners.

4.description: Continues to endure captivity while secretly planning and preparing for any opportunity to escape.

1.description: Leader of the Shaido Aiel, holding valuable prisoners including Faile and using them as leverage.
A powerful Shaido Wise One who has taken control over some of the captive Aes Sedai.
Red Ajah Aes Sedai held captive by the Shaido, forced to serve and humiliated by her captors.
Works closely with Perrin to plan the rescue of Faile and the other captives from the Shaido.
Gray Ajah advisor to Berelain, helping plan the approach to rescuing the Shaido captives.
Captain of the Winged Guards, preparing his forces for the dangerous rescue mission.
Seanchan Banner-General who has made an alliance with Perrin to deal with the Shaido threat.
A Seanchan officer serving under Banner-General Tylee in the alliance with Perrin.
Seanchan soldier working with the alliance to attack the Shaido camp.

9.description: The mysterious high-ranking Seanchan who has become involved with Mat, though her true identity remains hidden.

17.description: Continues her complex relationship with Mat while maintaining her Seanchan duties and perspective.

9.description: Tuon's bodyguard and so'jhin, fiercely protective and skilled in combat.
Seanchan Truthspeaker traveling with Tuon, with the unusual privilege of speaking harsh truths.
The gleeman continues to travel with Mat, using his skills and knowledge to navigate complex situations.
The thief-catcher from Tear, now traveling with Mat and helping navigate the occupied city.
The young boy continues under Mat's protection, adapting to life in the Seanchan-occupied city.
The old storyteller continues to travel with Mat, sharing his vast collection of tales and experiences.
Prince of Altara, dealing with the reality of Seanchan occupation of his homeland.
Queen of Altara, now ruling under Seanchan oversight and adapting to the new reality.
High Lady of the Seanchan, governing the occupied territories with her own ambitious agenda.
Captain of the Deathwatch Guard, maintaining his vigilant protection of the Blood.
Member of the Deathwatch Guard, serving with absolute loyalty to protect the Blood.
Deathwatch Guard serving in the occupied territories, maintaining elite standards.
Legendary archer and Warder to Elayne, helping secure the Lion Throne through her combat skills.
High Seat of House Taravin, one of Elayne's key supporters in claiming the Lion Throne.
High Seat of House Norwelyn, a powerful Andoran lord whose support is crucial for the succession.
High Seat of House Traemane, another key noble whose support Elayne needs for the throne.
High Seat of House Coelan, involved in the complex politics of the Andoran succession.
High Seat of House Pendar, one of the nobles whose decision will shape Andor's future.
High Seat of House Marne, one of Elayne's rivals for the Lion Throne with her own supporters.
High Seat of House Arawn, supporting Arymilla's claim to the throne against Elayne.
High Seat of House Sarand, another rival claimant with her own ambitions for the throne.
Husband to Elenia Sarand, supporting his wife's claim to the Lion Throne.
Green Ajah Aes Sedai supporting Elayne's claim to the throne, providing wisdom and power.
Green Ajah Aes Sedai working with Elayne in Caemlyn, helping secure the succession.
Brown Ajah Aes Sedai assisting Elayne, bringing scholarly knowledge to the political situation.
Gray Ajah Aes Sedai working with Elayne, skilled in negotiation and law.

25.description: Keeper of the Chronicles to Egwene, continuing to manage the rebellion against the White Tower.
Former Amyrlin Seat, now working as advisor to Egwene and contributing her political expertise.
Former Keeper of the Chronicles, now supporting the rebel cause with her experience.
Lord Captain Commander of the rebel army, maintaining the siege of Tar Valon.
Blue Ajah Aes Sedai continuing to advise Egwene and support the rebel cause.
Gray Ajah Aes Sedai among the rebels, using her legal expertise to support the cause.
White Ajah Aes Sedai applying logic and analysis to the rebel cause.
Brown Ajah Aes Sedai contributing scholarly knowledge to the rebel efforts.
Green Ajah Aes Sedai preparing for potential battle in support of the rebels.
Yellow Ajah Aes Sedai providing Healing services to the rebel forces.
The Red Ajah Amyrlin Seat defending the White Tower against the rebel siege.
White Ajah Keeper of the Chronicles, serving Elaida while pursuing her own agenda.
An Aes Sedai working within the White Tower during the siege.

1.description: Yellow Ajah Aes Sedai who has sworn to Rand, providing Healing expertise to his forces.

34.description: Contributes her Healing knowledge and strength to the massive working being undertaken.

1.description: White Ajah Aes Sedai who has sworn to Rand, despite her relatively weak strength in the Power.

34.description: Despite her limited strength, contributes what she can to the major working.

1.description: Green Ajah Aes Sedai who has sworn fealty to Rand, bringing her battle experience to his cause.

34.description: Uses her Green Ajah training and power in support of the massive undertaking.

34.description: Contributes her considerable strength and Green Ajah expertise to the working.

34.description: Provides crucial Healing expertise and strength to the massive Power working.

1.description: Green Ajah Aes Sedai who has sworn to Rand, dedicated to his cause with fierce determination.

34.description: Brings her devotion and strength to bear in the crucial working being undertaken.

1.description: Green Ajah Aes Sedai who was captured and is now sworn to Rand, having learned hard lessons.

34.description: Applies the lessons learned from her experiences to contribute to the working.

1.description: Brown Ajah Aes Sedai sworn to Rand after her capture, bringing scholarly knowledge to his service.

34.description: Uses her scholarly expertise and research to support the unprecedented working.

1.description: White Ajah Aes Sedai sworn to Rand, applying logical analysis to his cause.

34.description: Contributes her logical approach and analytical skills to the complex working.

1.description: Green Ajah Aes Sedai working with Cadsuane's group, strong in the Power and experienced in battle.

34.description: Brings her battle experience and considerable strength to the massive working.

1.description: Asha'man who seems unreliable and possibly unstable, serving with Rand's forces.
Asha'man with a harsh demeanor and questionable loyalty to Rand's cause.
Dedicated Asha'man whose loyalty to Rand appears increasingly questionable.
Dedicated Asha'man showing signs of instability and concerning behavior.

25.description: Asha'man operating in Far Madding with his own agenda against Rand.

1.description: The voice in Rand's head, memories and personality of the previous Dragon.
Former soldier and now Asha'man, one of the most skilled at Healing with saidin.

25.description: Dedicated Asha'man serving loyally with Rand's forces.
Young Soldier in the Black Tower, eager and loyal to Rand.

1.description: Taardad Aiel clan chief and one of Rand's most trusted advisors in warfare.
Shae'en M'taal Stone Dog warrior, loyal to Perrin and helping with the rescue.
Former Maiden of the Spear who now serves Rand in other capacities.
Maiden of the Spear protecting Rand, fierce and dedicated warrior.
Maiden of the Spear serving as one of Rand's bodyguards.
Maiden of the Spear among those protecting important figures.
One of Perrin's men, fighting in the rescue efforts.
Innkeeper who has joined Perrin's forces, providing local knowledge.
Dedicated Asha'man, one of the first to learn Traveling.
Dedicated Asha'man skilled in various weaves including Traveling.
Captain of Alliandre's guard, dedicated to rescuing his queen.
Queen of Ghealdan, captured alongside Faile by the Shaido.
Serving woman captured with Faile, showing remarkable composure under pressure.
Elderly serving woman with Maighdin, captured by the Shaido.
Maiden of the Spear captured by the Shaido along with other prisoners.
Maiden of the Spear, first-sister to Chiad, also held captive.
One of Faile's companions captured by the Shaido.
One of Faile's Cha Faile, captured and held by the Shaido.

9.description: Seanchan damane held by the sul'dam, wielding the One Power under control.
Sul'dam controlling damane for the Seanchan forces.
Former Aes Sedai, now a damane under Seanchan control.

1.description: Seanchan soldier working with the alliance forces.

25.description: Aes Sedai among the rebels, contributing to their cause.

Yellow Ajah Aes Sedai remaining in the White Tower during the siege.

Far Madding resident, part of the city's unique culture.
First Counsel of Far Madding, wielding significant political power.
Second Counsel of Far Madding, sharing power with the First Counsel.
Third Counsel of Far Madding, completing the ruling triumvirate.
Mysterious figure operating in Far Madding with unclear motives.
Dangerous figure pursuing his own deadly agenda in Far Madding.

9.description: Guard captain serving in Caemlyn with questionable loyalties and suspicious behavior.
Reliable captain of Elayne's Guard, competent and loyal military officer.
First Maid of the Royal Palace, efficiently managing the extensive palace staff.
Chief Clerk of the Royal Palace, handling administrative affairs and paperwork.

1.description: Wolfbrother helping Perrin with the rescue operation, understanding the ways of wolves.
Fanatical former soldier proclaiming himself Prophet of the chosen one.
Former secretary to Pedron Niall, now using information gathering skills for new masters.
Two Rivers man with excellent tracking and hunting skills, essential for the rescue.
Two Rivers man fighting in the rescue mission for Faile and the prisoners.
Two Rivers man participating in Perrin's rescue operation.

25.description: Aes Sedai working with the rebel forces during the siege of Tar Valon.
Brown Ajah sister among the rebels, contributing scholarly knowledge to their cause.
Blue Ajah Aes Sedai supporting the rebel cause and Egwene's leadership.

1.description: Wise One among the Shaido, wielding considerable influence in the clan.
Shaido Wise One involved in controlling the Aes Sedai prisoners.
Shaido Wise One participating in the control of prisoners and clan affairs.

recaps.1: The prologue reveals various perspectives as winter deepens and conflicts escalate across the land.
recaps.2: Perrin continues his desperate planning to rescue Faile from the Shaido, making difficult alliances.
recaps.3: The rescue preparations intensify as Perrin coordinates with unlikely allies against the Shaido camp.
recaps.4: Political maneuvering continues around the captives while rescue plans develop in complexity.
recaps.5: Final preparations are made for the assault on the Shaido camp to rescue the prisoners.
recaps.6: The rescue mission begins with coordinated attacks from multiple allied forces against the Shaido.
recaps.7: The battle for the captives reaches its climax as various forces converge on the Shaido camp.
recaps.8: The rescue concludes with success, freeing Faile and the other captives from Shaido control.
recaps.9: Mat finds himself navigating the complex politics of Seanchan-occupied Ebou Dar.
recaps.10: The political situation in Ebou Dar becomes more complex as Mat deals with Seanchan customs and expectations.
recaps.11: Mat's involvement with the mysterious high-ranking Seanchan woman deepens, creating new complications.
recaps.12: A unique and unprecedented bonding ceremony takes place, creating new connections between key characters.
recaps.13: The aftermath of the bonding creates new dynamics and understanding among those involved.
recaps.14: Political and personal relationships evolve as characters adapt to new circumstances and connections.
recaps.15: Various factions continue to maneuver as the effects of recent events ripple across the political landscape.
recaps.16: Elayne works to secure her claim to the Lion Throne while managing complex noble politics in Andor.
recaps.17: The relationship between Mat and the Seanchan woman develops further despite cultural barriers.
recaps.18: Political intrigue intensifies in both Andor and the occupied territories as various plans develop.
recaps.19: Characters face new challenges as winter deepens and the political situation becomes more volatile.
recaps.20: Strategic planning continues across multiple locations as various forces prepare for significant actions.
recaps.21: The political chess game reaches new levels of complexity with multiple players making crucial moves.
recaps.22: Various characters position themselves for major upcoming events as tensions rise.
recaps.23: Preparations reach their peak as multiple storylines converge toward significant confrontations.
recaps.24: Final positioning takes place as characters prepare for actions that will have far-reaching consequences.
recaps.25: Rand embarks on a dangerous mission to Far Madding, where channeling is impossible and enemies wait.
recaps.26: The mission in Far Madding continues as Rand and his companions navigate the hostile environment.
recaps.27: Egwene faces new challenges in maintaining the rebel siege while dealing with internal politics.
recaps.28: The situation in Far Madding becomes more dangerous as various threats converge on the mission.
recaps.29: Multiple storylines reach critical junctures as characters face their greatest challenges yet.
recaps.30: The rebel Aes Sedai continue their siege while dealing with the complexities of their divided forces.
recaps.31: Political and military tensions reach new heights as various factions prepare for decisive action.
recaps.32: Characters across multiple locations face the consequences of their choices and prepare for major events.
recaps.33: The stage is set for unprecedented action as various forces converge for a momentous undertaking.
recaps.34: A massive working of the One Power takes place, involving numerous channelers in an unprecedented effort.
recaps.35: The aftermath of the great working creates new realities and possibilities for the future of the world.
